title: Confession of Sin
verses: Psalm 51:10 (WEB) — “Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a right spirit within me.”
1 John 1:9 (WEB) — “If we confess our sins… he is faithful and righteous to forgive.”
Proverbs 28:13 (WEB) — “Whoever confesses and renounces them finds mercy.”
Acts 3:19 (WEB) — “Repent therefore, and turn again, that your sins may be blotted out.”
body: Confession is agreement with God that leads to cleansing and change. Don’t hide—come into the light, receive mercy, and walk in newness of life.
prayer: Merciful God, I confess my sin. Wash me, renew me, and set my feet on Your paths. Keep me close and clean. Amen.
